title: Design and Operational Strategies for Online Science Education Using AI Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Targeting current science teachers and educational experts, emphasizing real-time interaction and personalized feedback via AI chatbots.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of AI chatbots and their potential applications in online education
Learners design three or more interactive scenarios using AI chatbots in a science simulation environment

During VR-based task performance, learners will collect 10 feedback instances provided by an AI chatbot and achieve an educational effectiveness score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in at least four of the five predefined evaluation criteria (accuracy, timeliness, usefulness, clarity, motivation).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
